1dd1e0be-c48d-4bcd-95a7-9900cab14f5a.name: Diffuse
1dd1e0be-c48d-4bcd-95a7-9900cab14f5a.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

cef422c7-854c-477e-a678-65546e0d8fc0.name: Homogenous
cef422c7-854c-477e-a678-65546e0d8fc0.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

b366b223-92e8-45d4-8f0b-c4f19f1defe4.name: No Blood
b366b223-92e8-45d4-8f0b-c4f19f1defe4.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

764a9429-07d2-466c-8393-65cb2fbe33cd.name: No Brain
764a9429-07d2-466c-8393-65cb2fbe33cd.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

70a66a3c-0ac0-41af-b55f-3deed91f1842.name: No Eyes
70a66a3c-0ac0-41af-b55f-3deed91f1842.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

3d764017-ea9f-469f-86ea-8137cbfcfd10.name: No Head
3d764017-ea9f-469f-86ea-8137cbfcfd10.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

a742ff24-45c2-44ff-9948-4899b281a768.name: No Neck
a742ff24-45c2-44ff-9948-4899b281a768.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

09ae67a0-5b0c-451c-b611-3a854f329d76.name: No Vitals
09ae67a0-5b0c-451c-b611-3a854f329d76.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

de312b60-332a-411f-ba82-2a943ccbec85.name: Unliving
de312b60-332a-411f-ba82-2a943ccbec85.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

fba73897-6345-45af-bdcc-061bc9ed3c5f.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury
